name: Attack of the Clowns
description:
Created for the roll-the-dice gamejam, Attack of the Clowns is an in-browser game written using vanilla JavaScript and DOM manipulation. Understandably this isn't the best way to make a game, and animations are goofy because of CSS animations, but it was a great learning exercise for all those involved. :)

Using a random game concept generator, our team got the following concept:

"An action game where you beat up clowns just because."

Use `ctrl + +` or `ctrl + -` to change the zoom on the game. Alternatively, change the zoom of the browser with `ctrl + scrollwheel`

If the enemies do not load, refresh the page!
